titles.title: I Will Not Fear For You Have Set Your Love On Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not fear
For You have set Your love on me
And I will not turn back.
With my eyes on the prize
Of being one with You forever,
Your blood brings me nearer,
And I will not turn back.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your loving kindness is better than life
And Your mercies endureth forever and ever.
I will not leave the One Who has set
His love so strongly on me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will not fear
Even though You slay me,
For You'll never leave me.
Nothing can separate me,
Lord, from You,
Not life, nor death; You'll not forsake me,
And I will not turn back.
